name: The Final Declaration of Signor Ernest Alfieri
name_original: The Final Declaration of Signor Ernest Alfieri
description:
In which Signor Alfieri, gentleman scientist and philosopher, submits an exciting discovery to the scrutiny of the public, and loses a bet.

A text piece written in Ink, emulating the feel of a Victorian early science fiction story. 

PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Written for the Into Games Design Workout

"Create a scene where the lead character is a time traveller presenting his theory of time travel to an audience of his peers and investors! This dialogue sequence can be displayed however you like! Think about how this Time Traveller could act, Is he calm and collected? Sporadic and wacky? How does the audience react to his ideas?"
